Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: I maintained transparency and fairness throughout the investment process, proposing a reasonable allocation plan that offered a substantial share of profits to the investor. The successful investment outcome and equitable profit distribution reflect my commitment to ethical practices and building trust. My reputation is based on trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence, evident in my actions and dedication to integrity.

Investor_13.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13.content: As a new investor, Emma demonstrated openness and trust by investing 10.0 units and accepted the proposed profit share. Their willingness to engage in this opportunity lays a foundation for a positive relationship. Since they have no previous reputation, their actions in this transaction suggest a tendency toward pro-sociality and openness to collaboration.
